medium: Cotton, silk, gold color metal tape, wool, sequins
title: Jacket
description: unlined pounded indigo with batik inserts on upper sleeves and yoke and curved up back in circle patterns--blue, white, orange and gold; blue and white cuffs; jacket design has flared sides with vents and PR closure with ties; PR front short with inside ties; lower edges curved with applied tape binds; applied embroidered shoulder bands and distinct upper neck closure; floral and bird pattern blue, green, pink and metal embroidery on red and lavender; 1-7/8\" embroidered band at front edges--similar colors; lower back has two attached embroidered tabs, embroidered with green background and sequins
